Your reliable employment agency  Since 2013

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”About Section Text” _builder_version=”3.0.78″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”||0px|||”]

“The right person, in the right job, with the right skills at the right time!”

Just email us and we are ready to serve you better.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”|||” background_position_1=”top_left” background_position_2=”top_left” background_position_3=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” background_repeat_2=”no-repeat” background_repeat_3=”no-repeat” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_blurb title=”Manpower Supply” url=”#” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%101%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”60px” admin_label=”Service 01″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”22px” header_line_height=”1.8em” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”30%”]

We are supplying semi-skilled and skilled workers to Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Dubai and other foreign countries.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_blurb title=”Selection and Pre-Screening of Candidates” url=”#” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%52%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”60px” admin_label=”Service 02″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”22px” header_line_height=”1.8em” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”30%”]

We select candidates based on employment prerequisites of individual employers.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_blurb title=”Interview” url=”#” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%253%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”60px” admin_label=”Service 03″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”22px” header_line_height=”1.8em” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”30%”]

We assist employers for the selection of workers remotely (such as interview through skypes, video calls, phone calls, etc.) or onsite (interviewing personally in Myanmar).

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”|||” background_position_1=”top_left” background_position_2=”top_left” background_position_3=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” background_repeat_2=”no-repeat” background_repeat_3=”no-repeat” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_blurb title=”Pre-departure Arrangements” url=”#” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%151%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”60px” admin_label=”Service 01″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”22px” header_line_height=”1.8em” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”30%”]

We provide arrangement of medical check-up for workers. We also provide booking and purchasing to air ticket services for workers prior to departure.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_blurb title=”Trainings and Orientations” url=”#” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%283%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”60px” admin_label=”Service 02″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”22px” header_line_height=”1.8em” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”30%”]

We provide full trainings and orientations to workers before their departure. We are also providing trainings such as nursing, general orientation, languages, courses, sewing and etc.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_blurb title=”24/7 Support and Other Services” url=”#” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%176%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”60px” admin_label=”Service 03″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”22px” header_line_height=”1.8em” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”30%”]

24/7 support and responses to our business partners and workers. We also offer other migrant workers services.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”FAQ” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ custom_padding=”17px|0px|25px|0px||”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”45px|0px|45px|0px” background_position_1=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_width_px=”710px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_divider color=”#4e5ed0″ divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” max_width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” height=”5px” custom_margin=”||20px|” custom_padding=”||20px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”FAQ Section Title” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”36px” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Recruitment Strategies

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”40px|0px|40px|0px” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Question” _builder_version=”3.0.79″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” header_font=”Montserrat|on|||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.4em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Manpower Pooling

We gather manpower resources through our company website, social medias, through business partners, personal recommendations, and outreaching to potential candidates through campaigns.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Question” _builder_version=”3.0.79″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” header_font=”Montserrat|on|||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.4em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_fold=”20%” locked=”off”]

Pre-Screening

Our experience recruiting staffs conduct screening to potential candidates based on client’s job prerequisites.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Question” _builder_version=”3.0.79″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” header_font=”Montserrat|on|||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.4em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px|||||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Interview

We facilitate with all possible measures, resources and best efforts to employers to conduct the interviews for the selection of suitable candidates.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”40px|0px|40px|0px” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Question” _builder_version=”3.0.79″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” header_font=”Montserrat|on|||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.4em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px|||||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_fold=”20%” locked=”off”]

Trainings

We provide the relevant job trainings and orientations for workers to fit into the sending country’s cultures and job requirements.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Question” _builder_version=”3.0.79″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” header_font=”Montserrat|on|||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.4em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Contracts & Government Documentation Process

We ensure that contracts are in placed prior to departure and contract terms are transparent and meet the ethical requirement. We also ensure that government documentation processes are in timely and orderly manner.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Question” _builder_version=”3.0.79″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” header_font=”Montserrat|on|||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.4em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_fold=”20%” locked=”off”]

Timely Deployment

We ensure that required processes and worker sending schedules are in timely manner.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_row background_position_1=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_width_px=”710px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_divider color=”#4e5ed0″ divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” max_width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” height=”5px” custom_margin=”||20px|” custom_padding=”||20px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Statistics Section Title” _builder_version=”3.0.79″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”36px” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”11px|||||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Malaysia Recruitment Process 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.recruitmentmyanmarsak.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/malaysiaprocess.png” url=”#” use_overlay=”on” overlay_icon_color=”#ffffff” hover_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.55)” hover_icon=”%%3%%” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Project 01″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”500ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” always_center_on_mobile=”on”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row background_position_1=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_width_px=”710px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_divider color=”#4e5ed0″ divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” max_width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” height=”5px” custom_margin=”||20px|” custom_padding=”||20px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Statistics Section Title” _builder_version=”3.0.79″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”36px” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”11px|||||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Singapore Recruitment Process 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.recruitmentmyanmarsak.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Singaporeprocess.png” url=”#” use_overlay=”on” overlay_icon_color=”#ffffff” hover_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.55)” hover_icon=”%%3%%” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Project 01″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”500ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” always_center_on_mobile=”on”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row background_position_1=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_width_px=”710px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_divider color=”#4e5ed0″ divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” max_width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” height=”5px” custom_margin=”||20px|” custom_padding=”||20px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Statistics Section Title” _builder_version=”3.0.79″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”36px” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”11px|||||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Thailand Recruitment Process 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.recruitmentmyanmarsak.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Thailandprocess.png” url=”#” use_overlay=”on” overlay_icon_color=”#ffffff” hover_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.55)” hover_icon=”%%3%%” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Project 01″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”500ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” always_center_on_mobile=”on”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row background_position_1=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_width_px=”710px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_divider color=”#4e5ed0″ divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” max_width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” height=”5px” custom_margin=”||20px|” custom_padding=”||20px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Statistics Section Title” _builder_version=”3.0.79″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”36px” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”2px|||||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Required Documents

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Statistics Section Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Required documents for recruitment processes and work permit processing may vary from one country to another. The following principle documents are mainly required in all countries and by their applicable laws.

*Demand Letter*

*Power of Attorney* 

*Interparty agreement*

*Employment Contract*

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Email Subscribe” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#0c71c3″ background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(73,108,220,0.93)” custom_padding=”90px||60px|” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”4%”][et_pb_row background_position_1=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_width_px=”710px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” max_width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” height=”5px” custom_margin=”||20px|” custom_padding=”||20px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Statistics Section Title” _builder_version=”3.0.79″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”36px” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

WHY US?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row background_position_1=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_width_px=”710px”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Request Section Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.0.78″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Our recruiting managers and representatives perform interview and pre-screening in accordance with employer’s job requirement prior to employer’s interview which helps employers to save time and resources to hunt for the right person for the right job.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Request Section Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.0.78″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Our recruiting managers and representatives have excellent knowledge and experience in employment industry and providing recruitment services professionally to meet or exceed the customer expectations and satisfaction. We are upholding the following values while working with our partners.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Request Section Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.0.78″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

  • Professionalism and Quality;
  • Honesty and Trustworthy;
  • Reliable and Dependable;
  • Affordable and Efficient;
  • Excellent customer service;
  • Licensed and Ensured.
  • Ethical Recruitment
  • 24/7 Immediate response to our partners.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Footer” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_image=”https://www.recruitmentmyanmarsak.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/business-01.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”90px||90px|” saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ custom_padding=”|||” make_equal=”on” background_color_1=”#ffffff” background_color_2=”#ffffff” background_position_1=”top_left” background_position_2=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” background_repeat_2=”no-repeat” padding_top_1=”50px” padding_top_2=”50px” padding_right_1=”40px” padding_right_2=”40px” padding_bottom_1=”50px” padding_bottom_2=”50px” padding_left_1=”40px” padding_left_2=”40px” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Contact US Title” _builder_version=”3.0.78″ text_font_size=”16px” header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”22px” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]
